struct.exostring: Selected after Chuundar dead and player has gone through initial dialogue. Special: Do not display if player has pissed off Freyyr and Zaalbar is NOT in the party.

Tricky thing: Do not display this question if: It is set to 1 AND Zaalbar is in the party (Player asked the question and Zaalbar took offense, preventing him from asking again)
OR
It is set to 2 (Player asked the question to it's rude conclusion.

Initial after Chuundar dead. Freyyr initiates.

Evil force adjustment. This is pure greed, whether he succeeds or not.
Player has Bacca's sword on him. Set state to 2, meaning the "I want to ask about the reward you gave." question does not appear again.

Evil force adjustment. This is pure greed, whether he succeeds or not. Player is trying to sell a prized possession of Zaalbar's.
Set that Freyyr is really pissed at the player. Will no longer talk to him without Zaalbar present.
This is not actually a presuade check. The player is really trying to be an ass here. More a joke.
